titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at Paules Crosse the Fryday before Easter, commonly called good Friday, in the yeere of our Lorde. 1579. By Iohn Knewstub
titleStmt.author: Knewstubs, John, 1544-1624.
Knewstub, John. Confutation of monstrous and horrible heresies, taught by H.N. aut

publicationStmt.publisher: At the three Cranes in the Vintree, by Thomas Dawson for Richard Sergier,

notesStmt.note: The sermon was actually preached in 1576--STC.
First printed as part of: Knewstubs, John. A confutation of monstrous and horrible heresies, taught by H.N.
Trimmed at head, affecting running title and folio numbers.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
